name: Krassgames - no need to move mouse at job clicking
description: When doing jobs and finding stuff the mouse pointer usually has to be moved down to do next job. This script makes the job link stay in the same position. Enjoy!
additional_info:
Krassgames - no need to move mouse at job clicking
==================================================
Mobile Mafia (mm.krassgames.com) and Pocket Dictator (pd.krassgames.com) are currently supported.
